official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the limitations of section 280A will not apply to rentals under shared equity financing arrangements.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the limitations placed on tax deductions for the business or rental use of a home shall not apply to rentals under shared equity financing arrangements. Defines "shared equity financing agreement" for purposes of this Act.
